Create a savory bread loaf infused with different herbs and spices such as rosemary, thyme, sage, garlic, and black pepper. This will give the bread a unique flavor that pairs well with soups, stews, and salads.
Make a sweet bread loaf with a twist by adding dried fruit such as cranberries, raisins, or apricots. This will add a burst of sweetness and texture to the bread.
Create a gluten-free bread loaf using alternative flours such as almond flour, coconut flour, or oat flour. This will cater to those with celiac disease or gluten intolerance.
Make a bread loaf with a surprise filling such as caramelized onions, melted cheese, or a dollop of pesto. This will add an extra layer of flavor and excitement to the bread.
Create a sourdough bread loaf by using a natural starter or store-bought sourdough starter. This will give the bread a tangy, fermented flavor that is both healthy and delicious.
